definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Try not to use anonymous types in schemas.
sentences.chinese: 不要尝试在模式中使用匿名类型。

sentences.english: However, this defeats the strong typing of the anonymous type.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这无法用于强型别的匿名型别。

sentences.english: Will Online Anonymity Have Gone the Way of the Dodo by2020?
sentences.chinese: 2020年前，匿名上网这种形式是否会消失？

sentences.english: Is it beneficial to declare PHP anonymous functions outside a loop?
sentences.chinese: 它是有益的申报PHP匿名函数外循环？

sentences.english: Alcoholics Anonymous twelve-step program originated to help people overcome their addiction;
sentences.chinese: 匿名十二步戒酒法旨在帮助人们戒除酒瘾。

sentences.english: Inside the firewall, there is no anonymity.
sentences.chinese: 在防火墙内部，没有匿名机制。

sentences.english: And we must also grapple with the issue of anonymous speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们还必须解决匿名发表言论的问题。

sentences.english: Notifiers make anonymous communication between objects in a system possible.
sentences.chinese: 事件通知使得系统中各对象间可以实现匿名通信。

sentences.english: But until the age of the Internet, anonymity was a rare thing.
sentences.chinese: 但是到了互联网时代，匿名性是个稀奇的事情。

sentences.english: Lockard sent the package anonymously, just on a whim.
sentences.chinese: 因此洛卡德先生一时兴起，寄送了一个匿名的包裹。

sentences.english: Gets a value that indicates whether to allow NTLM authentication.
sentences.chinese: 获取一个值，该值指示是否允许匿名调用方。

sentences.english: Some courts use anonymous juries, meaning that jurors are identified only by number.
sentences.chinese: 一些法院采用匿名陪审团，即用数字代号标识陪审员。

sentences.english: and many of the anonymous poets from the old English period that I studied in my graduate school days.
sentences.chinese: 还有许多我在大学里学过的古英语时期的匿名诗人。

sentences.english: These issues can be remedied by converting anonymous types to named types.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过将匿名类型转换为命名类型来解决这些问题。

sentences.english: Galhara also prefers the anonymity of online friendships.
sentences.chinese: 盖哈啦也偏爱线上交友的匿名方式。

sentences.english: An anonymoustrader commented that the computer might have gone ahead and processed, something of an error happened there.
sentences.chinese: 一个匿名交易人说电脑可能出差错了。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to explain oneself/to express/to reveal one's thoughts or feelings/declaration/confession
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
